member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.Authorization.AndOperator
member.summary: Represents an operator that performs a logical-AND of its contained left and right expressions, but only evaluates its second expression if the first expression evaluates to true.

member.summary: Allows end users to implement their own Security Caches.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SaveIdentity(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary: Caches an authenticated IIdentity object. There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: IIdentity object representing an authenticated user.
member.returns: Token to identify the cached Identity

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SaveIdentity(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.IToken)
member.summary: Caches an authenticated IIdentity object using an existing token enabling the grouping of related items. There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: IIdentity object representing an authenticated user.
Token identifying an existing cached entities.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SavePrincipal(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal)
member.summary: Caches an authenticated IPrincipal object. There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: IPrincipal object representing an authenticated user and roles.
member.returns: Token to identify the cached IPrincipal object

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SavePrincipal(System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.IToken)
member.summary: Caches an authenticated IPrincipal object using an existing token enabling the grouping of related items. There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: IPrincipal object representing an authenticated user.
Token identifying an existing cached entity.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SaveProfile(System.Object)
member.summary: Caches a profile for an authenticated user. There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: Object representing the profile of authenticated user.
member.returns: Token to identify the cached Profile object

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.ISecurityCacheProvider.SaveProfile(System.Object,Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.IToken)
member.summary: Caches a profile for an authenticated user using an existing token (enabling the grouping of related items). There is no implicit expiration defined for this item.
member.param: Object representing the profile of authenticated user.
Token identifying an existing cached entity.

member.summary: Purges an existing Profile object from the cache.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.NamePasswordCredential.Password
member.summary: Gets the password of this credential as a string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.SecurityRolesProvider
member.summary: Base class for RolesProviders in the security infrastructure. This class encapsulates the basic policy of how roles are retrieved from the underlying store, construction of a principal based on the roles and identity of the user, and calls instrumentation. Details of how this all happens are left to subclasses.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.SecurityRolesProvider.GetRoles(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary: Verifies the object and wraps it inside a new object along with any security roles the user is a member of.
member.param: An object representing an authenticated user.
member.returns: If successfull, returns the populated object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Security.SecurityRolesProvider.CollectAllUserRoles(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary: Subclasses must override this method to retrieve the associated list of user roes for the given identity.
member.param: Identity of user used for retrieval
member.returns: String array of roles for the given user identity
